job_description:
Design, develop, and deploy machine learning and deep learning models

Build end-to-end AI pipelines: data preprocessing → training → evaluation → deployment

Work with LLMs, NLP, Computer Vision, or Predictive Models (based on use case)

Optimize models for performance, scalability, and cost

Integrate AI models with APIs, backend services, and applications

Monitor model performance and retrain models when required

Stay updated with the latest AI/ML research and industry trends

conversation.content: Um, hello. I'm and I'm currently working as an intern uh, as an AI and Senior at scopely. Uh, I'm Vex CSC 2026, batch student.

Hi Vaibhavee! It's great to meet you. Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. I see you’re currently an AI Engineering Intern at Scopely and studying Computer Science. Can you tell me more about your overall experience and career journey so far? What led you to pursue a career in AI and machine learning?
Great to hear from you again, Vaibhavee! I just asked about your overall experience and career journey. Could you share what led you to pursue a career in AI and machine learning?

It seems like there might be a bit of a delay in your response. Take your time! I’m here to listen whenever you’re ready to share your journey and what motivated you to get into the field of AI and machine learning.

evaluation.summary: Vaibhavee Singh has a strong technical background and relevant experience in AI/ML, aligning well with the job's technical requirements. However, communication during the interview was significantly lacking.
